Package util.htmltool

Class Summary
HtmlDetailsPaneContentGenerator HtmlDetailsPaneContentGenerator generates HTML content for the details pane, making use of HtmlTool.
HtmlGenerator  
HtmlMapBalloonContentGenerator  
HtmlMapContentGenerator HtmlMapContentGenerator provides methods for building a map using Goolge maps.
HtmlMapPageGenerator This HtmlMapGenerator extension is used to generate the main overview page for normal browsers.
HtmlMobileMapPageGenerator This HtmlMapGenerator extension is used to generate the main overview page for mobile browsers.
HtmlPageGenerator HtmlPageGenerator generates an HTML page, including header, body and scripts.
HtmlTool A support class with static methods which generate basic HTML elements and structures.
